snippet.title: Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream - Announcement Trailer & Developer Message
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2479770

Troublemaker 2 is an open-world action-comedy beat-'em-up game set in the fictional settings of South Jayakarta, a diverse city in Indonesia. Play as Jordan and Budi alongside the Beyond Dream band and Parakacuk gang, as together, they overcome all obstacles to chase their dreams.
Teenagers, Dreams, and Drugs. Unveil the secrets of South Jayakarta city, set two years after the ending of the original Troublemaker. The journey of the “Parakacuk” gang continues alongside the “Beyond Dream” band in South Jayakarta city in this fun open-world action-comedy beat-'em-up game.

🎵Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream, Coming Soon 2025, Wishlist Now on Steam!
🎬Parakacuk: Troublemaker Live Action Movie, In Development with @LytoPictures !
🤘Troublemaker: Raise Your Gang, Available now on Xbox!

Hi Geng!
Thank you so much for standing by us throughout this journey, 
Bringing us to this moment. 
Your unwavering support has been the driving force behind our continued creativity and help us to become better action game developer. 
Now, it is time for us to elevate our IP(Intellectual Property), #Troublemaker !

Press kit, game details, character details, and more detailed information can be found on our 
official website at www.gamecomteam.com in Indonesian and English languages.

Dare to Dream! Beyond Dream!
Stay Tune, Stay UwU

Follow us on socials:
Discord — https://www.bit.ly/gamecomteamdiscord
X(Twitter) — https://twitter.com/GamecomTeam
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/gamecomteam
Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/GamecomTeam

#gamecomteam #troublemaker  #troublemakergame #troublemaker2 #daretodream #beyonddream #igdx
